adjective.description: Born or produced in one's own home, household, or country; native, indigenous; home-grown.

noun.description: A person born in a particular country, as distinguished from an immigrant or incomer; a native. Also with the and plural concord: native-born people as a class. Now rare.

origin: Late 16th century; earliest use found in William Harrison (1535–1593), historian and topographer. From home + born.
